description:
Suzu escapes from her mean master to visit Sai-o in Chokan Palace.  Kei State’s Army also saves Shokei from the villagers trying to kill her after they found out her identity as Princess of Ho, and takes her to Gekkei, who killed Shokei’s father.  Gekkei tells her to leave the kingdom, and the queen of Kyo Kingdom across Kyo-Kai takes her in.  Yoko finds out she was a target for assassination by her 3 personal aides including her dinner host, Taishi, and Kokan whom she recently discharged from his position, and also Chief Heaven’s Officer.  Fortunately, the attempt is stopped by the palace’s security.  At the meeting with officers, Yoko realizes that she is trying to please everybody, still acting the same as before, and starts thinking about leaving the palace.
Source: crunchyroll
